content: Anyone at 38c3? There's a surprising (to me) lack of functional programming assemblies
I'm not but you've got my jealousy, CCC is perpetually on my "want to go and never make it" list. Enjoy it.
@Mauricio Collares hello! We could organize an impromptu Lean meeting. There is also an Agda workshop by Ingo Blechschmidt.
I am, Iâ€™d attend a lean meetup if there is one. I was also thinking of attending the Agda workshop if Iâ€™m not too tired at that hour
I came back to the hotel early today, but I'd be happy to meet on day 3!
